cancel_confirm: Oh well, I'm pretty sure you can handle it on your own. Good luck!
step1: Let me teach you how to look around. The easiest way is the default. Your camera will always follow your ship in the center of the screen. If you want to reset your camera at any point to that state, press C button on your keyboard.
Ok, I get it. Tell me how do I look somewhere else but my ship?
step2: To move the camera around, left-click on the minimap in the top right corner. Try it out.
Hold on, I missed something. Can you repeat the previous step?
step3: You can drag the rectangle on the minimap for a smoother movement.
Ah, nice. Is there a way to make it bigger or smaller?
Hold on, I missed something. Can you repeat the previous step?
step4: Yes, you can. Try scrolling your mousewheel. There zoom can be somewhere between x0.5 and x2.0.

Hold on, I missed something. Can you repeat the previous step?
